PSCT.Base: If you have 2 or more "Salamangreat" monsters in your GY: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If a "Salamangreat" Ritual, Fusion, Synchro, Xyz, or Link Monster(s) is Special Summoned to your field, while this card is in your GY (except during the Damage Step): You can target 1 other "Salamangreat" monster in your GY; place this card on the bottom of your Deck, and if you do, Special Summon that monster to your opponent's field, then draw 1 card. You can only use each effect of "Salamangreat Weasel" once per turn.
